attributes.action: Stop cuts to youth centers and youth projects.
attributes.additional_details:
We are calling for a serious debate in parliament on the governments plans to cut youth centers and community projects that are a vital to the youth particularly in deprived areas.

While we do not condone the actions of rioters we believe that where the media/culture may have had a negative impact on these kids and where parents may have failed them these programs can give them good roll models, a sense of purpose and something to do.

The youth are the future and we believe cuts to these services will and are having a devastating effect on these communities so we are calling for an end to them. After all young people are not responsible for this economic crisis.
